title: godoc: policies link is broken
body:
The file code.google.com/p/go.tools/godoc/static as a link to
http://code.google.com/policies.html#restrictions from the word noted in the sentence
"Except as noted, the content of this page is licensed under the Creative Commons
Attribution 3.0 License, and code is licensed under a BSD license."  That link is
broken.  There is no longer a page http://code.google.com/policies.html.  I don't know
what used to be on that page and I don't know what the restrictions were.  One way or
another, this broken link should be fixed.
